name: GdR PRoductions
tag_list: public-relations, digital, publicity, entertainment, video, advertising
overview:
Digital publicity firm that crafts creative communication campaigns to raise awareness, create brand equity and elevate executive profile through editorial coverage and thought leadership.

Launched in early 2010, GdR PRoductions is a Los Angeles publicity agency created to meet the rising needs of the alternative programming industry. As technology and entertainment vehicles continue to evolve, engaging consumer communities and providing properties with heightened visibility have become crucial to the success of new media companies.

For modern content creators, leak campaigns fueled by digital assets captured during principle photography are essential for building early excitement and successfully launching a television property. As such, GdR PRoductions partners with production to build comprehensive unit publicity packages including electronic press kits, series photography and promotional materials.

For corporate clients attempting to yield competitive advantages, GdR Productions leverages its intimate experience in the digital programming landscape to garner media attention, create brand equity and establish executives as industry thought leaders.

Most importantly, GdR PRoductions aggressively executes to motivate behavior towards business objectives and provides real world results for a high return on investment.
